Visibility: 48.3 km

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
